title: It's official, Akali is now 100% useless
body: Title. Why even bother explaining, it's pretty self evident at this point.

replies.body: im not sure why its downvoted honestly. its completely true, but yet people downvote a true statement? sigh...

Why play Akali at all when {{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:103}} exist? All three have enough mobility to outplay opponents, enough sticking ability to avoid being kited, enough burst to assassinate a squishy within 2 seconds when fed, and enough utility to survive after blowing said squishy back to the hell that is their base?

I do not believe that the introductions of new champions or reworked champions should invalidate another as a choice but until Akali gets a meaningful rework (fat chance NOW) she isn't worth the ip.
Good luck trying to assassinate a Veigar or a Syndra now. Or a Lucian. Or anybody that isn't Jinx or Soraka for that matter.
